attributes.action: Answer the questions asked at Prime Ministers Question Time and not to avoid answering by asking another question.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Invariably the Prime Minister avoids answering an awkward question (mainly from the Leader of the Opposition) by asking another question or by crititicising the Opposition. This causes frustration not only to the questioner but also to the listener who would like to hear a truthful answer from the Prime Minister.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
